quotes.phrase: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.phrase: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.phrase: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.phrase: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.phrase: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.phrase: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.phrase: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.phrase: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.phrase: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.phrase: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.phrase: One of the most beautiful qualities of truye friendship is to understand and to be understood.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.phrase: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.phrase: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tsu

quotes.phrase: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.phrase: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery... But today is a gift. That is why it's called Present.
quotes.author: Master Oogway

quotes.phrase: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
quotes.author: Princess Diana
